```{julia}
df = workload()

psp_df = @rsubset(df, :id == "PSP"; view=true)

thm_df = @rsubset(df, :id == "THEMIS"; view=true)
```

```{julia}
compute_params!(df)
compute_Alfvenicity_params!(df)

compute_PSP_anisotropy_params!(psp_df)
for enc in 7:9
    tmin_wind, tmax_wind = get_timerange(enc)[2]
    wind_df_enc = @rsubset(wind_df, :enc == enc; view=true)
    compute_Wind_anisotropy_params!(wind_df_enc, tmin_wind, tmax_wind)

    thm_df_enc = @rsubset(thm_df, :enc == enc; view=true)
    compute_THM_anisotropy_params!(thm_df_enc, tmin_wind, tmax_wind)
end
```

```{julia}
using Beforerr: add_labels!, align_ylabels!
update_theme!(; Lines=(linewidth=1, alpha=0.9), figure_padding=(1, 1, 1, 15))

function add_wind_twin!(gl, wind_axs)
    # Create a twin axis for Wind magnetic field and density (multiply by the radial ratio)
    # 1AU / 1Rsun =215
    B_ax = wind_axs.axes[1]
    B_ax2 = Axis(gl[1, 1]; yaxisposition=:right, rightspinevisible=true, rightspinecolor=:darkgray)
    hidexdecorations!(B_ax2, grid=false)
    ylims!(B_ax, 0.1, 9.9)
    ylims!(B_ax2, 0.1 * (0.1)^(-1.59), 9.9 * (0.1)^(-1.59))
    n_ax = wind_axs.axes[2]
    n_ax2 = Axis(gl[2, 1]; yaxisposition=:right, rightspinevisible=true, rightspinecolor=:darkgray)
    hidexdecorations!(n_ax2, grid=false)
    ylims!(n_ax, 3, 16)
    ylims!(n_ax2, 3 * (0.1)^(-1.96), 16 * (0.1)^(-1.96))222
end

function overview_plot(enc)
    (tmin_psp, tmax_psp), (tmin_wind, tmax_wind) = get_timerange(enc)
    legend = (; position=Top())

    f = Figure(; size=(1000, 800))
    psp_axs = plot_PSP(f[1, 1], tmin_psp, tmax_psp, get_vl_ratio_ts(psp_df)...; legend)
    modify_faxs_base!(psp_axs)
    gl = GridLayout(f[1, 2])
    wind_axs = plot_Wind(f[1, 2], tmin_wind, tmax_wind - Day(1), get_vl_ratio_ts(wind_df)...; legend)
    modify_faxs_base!(wind_axs)

    labels = (; labels='1':'9', position=Left(), padding=(32, -32, 0, 0))
    add_labels!(f[1, 1]; labels..., open="(a.")
    add_labels!(f[1, 2]; labels..., open="(b.")
    colgap!(f.layout, 2)

    hideylabel!.(wind_axs.axes)
    add_wind_twin!(gl, wind_axs)
    align_ylabels!(psp_axs.axes)
    easy_save("overview-$enc-all")
    return f
end

overview_plot(7)
# overview_plot.(7:9)
```

## The effect of tau

```{julia}
psp_df_taus = map([2, 4, 8, 16, 32]) do tau
    psp_conf["tau"] = tau
    df = PSPAnisotropy.produce(psp_conf, psp_conf["timeranges"][1]...)
    @transform! df :tau = tau
    compute_Alfvenicity_params!(df)
end

wind_df_taus = map([2, 4, 8, 16, 32]) do tau
    wind_conf["tau"] = tau
    df = PSPAnisotropy.produce(wind_conf, wind_conf["timeranges"][1]...)
    @transform! df :tau = tau
    compute_Alfvenicity_params!(df)
end
```
